Package view_controller

Class WordleAccount

java.lang.Object
view_controller.WordleAccount
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class WordleAccount extends Object implements Serializable
Stores account information for users of the Wordle app.

  • Constructor Details

    • WordleAccount

      public WordleAccount(String username, String password)
      Constructor for WordleAccount. Sets username and password based on user's input. Sets other fields to 0 or empty data structures.
      Parameters:
      username - user's unique identifier
      password - user's private key to login with their username

  • Method Details

    • checkUsername

      public boolean checkUsername(String username)
      Determines if the username given is equal to the username of the current account selected.
      Parameters:
      username - user's unique identifier
      Returns:
      true if the usernames are the same, false otherwise

    • getUsername

      public String getUsername()
      Gets username of account
      Returns:
      string username

    • checkPassword

      public boolean checkPassword(String password)
      Determines if the password given is equal to the password of the current account selected.
      Parameters:
      password - user's private key to login with their username
      Returns:
      true if the passwords are the same, false otherwise

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Provides a string representation of an account for testing purposes
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      string representation of the account

    • addWin

      public void addWin(int level)
      adds a win to the accounts also adding to timesPlayed, breakPts[level], and curStreak. Checks if curStreak is greater than maxStreak. Sets maxStreak to curStreak if curStreak is greater than maxStreak.
      Parameters:
      level - the number of guesses it took the user to win

    • getWin

      public int getWin()
      Gets the number of wins a user has
      Returns:
      int user wins

    • addLose

      public void addLose()
      Adds a loss to the accounts also adding to timesPlayed. Sets curStreak to 0.

    • getLose

      public int getLose()
      Gets the number of losses the user has
      Returns:
      int user losses

    • getWinPrct

      public int getWinPrct()
      Calculates and returns the user's percentage of wins based on their total times played.
      Returns:
      the percentage of wins a user has (int whole number)

    • getCurStreak

      public int getCurStreak()
      Gets the user's current win streak
      Returns:
      current win streak

    • getMaxStreak

      public int getMaxStreak()
      Gets the user's all time maximum win streak
      Returns:
      user's maximum win streak

      public int[] getBreakPoints()
      Gets the user's guess distribution
